Smart Water Bottle: Create a smart water bottle that can track the amount of water you drink each day, sending reminders to drink more water, and alerting you if you have not reached your daily water intake goal.

Insulated Water Bottle: Develop a water bottle that is insulated to keep drinks hot or cold for extended periods of time. This can be especially useful for people who like to bring their water with them on the go.
Water Bottle with Built-in Bluetooth Speaker: Create a water bottle with a built-in Bluetooth speaker that allows you to listen to music or podcasts while on the go.

Water Bottle with Built-in UV Sterilizer: Develop a water bottle that has a built-in UV sterilizer to kill bacteria and other harmful microorganisms. This can help keep the water clean and safe to drink.

Water Bottle with Built-in GPS Tracker: Create a water bottle that has a built-in GPS tracker to track your location and route while running or hiking. This can be useful for people who want to track their progress and stay safe during outdoor activities.
